Class MailProperties

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.mail.autoconfigure.MailProperties
@ConfigurationProperties("spring.mail") public class MailProperties extends Object
Configuration properties for email support.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Oliver Gierke, Stephane Nicoll, Eddú Meléndez
